item.title: Ed Sheeran Teams With Arijit Singh for ‘Sapphire’ Cross-Cultural Remix – Global Bulletin
item.description: BOLLYWOOD BEATS Ed Sheeran has released a cross-cultural remix of his summer hit “Sapphire” featuring Indian singer Arijit Singh. The new version blends English, Hindi and Punjabi-language
